data.name: Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1
data.detailed_description:
Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1 - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Nature & Wildlife - Jigsaw Puzzle - Expansion Pack 1 is designed for adults and for kids.

With this DLC you unlock 80 new puzzles.

- 5 difficulty settings: Up to 280 pieces!
- Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time!
- Saves all puzzles in progress, so you can work on several at the same time.
- 1080p HD Graphics.
- Support multiple screen sizes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
